parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>Command</title><part><name>Comments</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma </value></part><part><name>Game name</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.00</value></part><part><name>Game version</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Environment </value></part><part><name>GROUP1</name>=<value>



</value></part><part><name>eff</name>=<value> local</value></part><part><name>Multiplayer Effects</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Enable/disable environmental effects: ambient life and/or ambient sound.
<template lineStart="1"><title>Informative </title><part><name index="1"/><value> Disabling ambient life will remove generation of anything that is coming from ''AmbientA3'' map class (see [[Arma_3_Animals:_Ambient_System|Ambient System]]).<br>
That means removing not only bees and cicadas around a player, but rabbits, snakes, seagulls and all the fish in the sea.</value></part></template> </value></part><part><name>DESCRIPTION</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> [[enableEnvironment]] enabled </value></part><part><name>SYNTAX</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> enabled: [[Boolean]] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER1</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]] </value></part><part><name>RETURNVALUE</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name>s2</name>=<value> [[enableEnvironment]] [ambientLife, ambientSound] &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(''Since <template><title>arma3</title></template> v1.67'') </value></part><part><name>SYNTAX2</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p21</name>=<value> ambientLife: [[Boolean]] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER21</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p22</name>=<value> ambientSound: [[Boolean]] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER22</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>r2</name>=<value> [[Nothing]] </value></part><part><name>RETURNVALUE2</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[enableEnvironment]] [[false]];</code> </value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE1</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> <code>[[enableEnvironment]] [<ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/></ext>[[false]], [[true]]];</code> </value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE2</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="6"/><value> [[environmentEnabled]], [[initAmbientLife]], [[sideAmbientLife]], [[getAllEnvSoundControllers]], [[getEnvSoundController]], [[setSoundEffect]]</value></part><part><name>SEEALSO</name>=<value>
</value></part></template>

<h3 style="display:none">Notes</h3>
<dl class="command_description">
<comment><!-- Note Section BEGIN -->
</comment>
<dd class="notedate">Posted on 28 October, 2013	 
<dt class="note">[[User:Killzone_Kid|Killzone_Kid]]
<dd class="note">
This command has to be executed after mission start to have an effect. So if you add this command in ''init.sqf'' make sure you wait until mission is running:
<code><template><title>cc</title><part><name index="1"/><value>in e.g init.sqf</value></part></template>
[[waitUntil]] { [[time]] > 0 };
[[enableEnvironment]] [[false]];</code>

<comment><!-- Note Section END -->
</comment></dl>
